alert.note: Alert for Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:03PM EDT until August 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 602 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Conyngham, or 8 miles southeast of Berwick, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hazleton, West Hazleton, Freeland, Bear Creek, Dorrance, Conyngham, Nescopeck, Slocum, White Haven and Nuangola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
